name: root
description: A monorepo of Vue and JS packages for Cosmos SDK apps
author: Tendermint, Inc <hello@tendermint.com>

scripts.dev:watch: npm run bootstrap:local && lerna exec --parallel --scope='{@starport/vue,@starport/vuex}' -- npm run dev
scripts.netlify:build: npm run netlify:prepare && npm run netlify:linkvue && npm run netlify:linkvuex && cd ./packages/template && npm install && npm link @starport/vue @starport/vuex && npm run build -- --mode spn
